alert.note: Alert for Johnston; Wayne; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 12:58AM EDT until May 20 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wayne County in central North Carolina... Southern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Eastern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 1256 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Smithfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Goldsboro, Smithfield, Wilson, Fremont, Walnut Creek, Micro, Selma, Pine Level, Kenly and Princeton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
